parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that determines the start point of the query.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource.

Valid values of N: `[1, 50]`.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource.

Tags are supported for API groups, plug-ins, and apps. Operations performed on APIs are based on the tags of API groups.

*   **apiGroup**
*   **plugin**
*   **app**
*   **api**

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag of objects that match the rule. You can specify multiple tags.
